content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max Müller, let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for a place to live in the city center. Your apartment seems to be a great fit for me. How much are you asking for the rent?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm asking for a fair price of 1500 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit higher than I expected. Would you be willing to lower the price? I'm a responsible tenant who always pays on time and takes good care of the property.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sure you are a great tenant, Max. However, my apartment is in high demand due to its prime location and modern facilities. I'm willing to negotiate, but I can't go below 1400 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 1400 Euros is more in line with what I had in mind. Considering the current housing market, I think this is a fair price. Would you be willing to accept 1350 Euros per month? I promise to be a model tenant.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Max, but 1350 Euros is too low for my apartment. Considering its location and facilities, I can't go below 1375 Euros per month. This is as low as I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. 1375 Euros is more reasonable. I'm willing to agree to this price if you're sure you can't go any lower. I'm looking forward to making this apartment my home.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1375] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful! I'm happy to hear that we've reached an agreement. I'm sure you will enjoy living in the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
